Test Case Description: Verify global header and hero area render correctly on first load
Test Steps:
1) Open home page
2) Visually inspect header/hero
Expected Result: Header, title, and primary actions are visible and aligned

Test Case Description: Validate navigation links anchor-scroll to correct sections
Test Steps:
1) Click each nav link
2) Observe scroll target
Expected Result: Each link scrolls to the correct section with smooth behavior

Test Case Description: Check font sizes, weights, and line-height consistency
Test Steps:
1) Inspect headings/body text
2) Compare to design tokens
Expected Result:
Readable typography
 no truncation or overlaps

Test Case Description: Hover, focus, active states visible on all buttons
Test Steps:
1) Tab through buttons
2) Hover and click
Expected Result:
Distinct visual states
 focus ring clearly visible

Test Case Description: Images are responsive and preserve aspect ratio
Test Steps:
1) Resize viewport
2) Observe images in cards/sections
Expected Result:
Images scale without distortion
 no overflow

Test Case Description: Truth tables scroll horizontally on small viewports
Expected Result:
Tables are scrollable
 no layout break

Test Case Description: Cards have consistent padding, border, and shadow
Expected Result: Consistent spacing and elevation per style

Test Case Description: Back-to-top and in-page links work correctly
Expected Result: Smooth scroll and correct target focus

Test Case Description: Color scheme meets brand and legibility standards
Test Steps:
1) Inspect color contrast
2) Check accent usage
Expected Result:
Primary/secondary colors consistent
 no illegible text

No overflows
 grid aligns
 no excessive whitespace

Navigation and content adapt
 no clipping

All critical content accessible
 controls tappable

Test Case Description: Open/close Lab3 modal via button and ESC
Test Steps:
1) Open Lab3 modal
2) Press ESC
3) Click outside
Expected Result:
Modal opens
 ESC and backdrop close it
 focus returns

Test Case Description:
Open/close Lab4 modal
 trap focus within modal
Test Steps:
1) Open Lab4 modal
2) Tab cycles inside
3) Shift+Tab cycles back
Expected Result: Focus does not escape modal until closed

Invalid blocked
 valid accepted
 error styles shown for invalid
Focus moves to correct neighbor cells

Test Case Description: Fill with correct values action populates grid
Expected Result: Grid populated as per expected solution

All cells reset
 no residual focus styling

Test Case Description: Copy K-Map answer copies to clipboard (modern)
Copy fallback works when clipboard API unavailable
Function H K-Map interactions work (validate, execute)
Boolean simplification shows correct minimized form
Start/Stop clock updates states and displays
Expected Result:
JK states and displays update
 stop halts updates

Test Case Description: Single pulse advances state by one
Seven-segment and LED outputs reflect state
Enhanced tooltips show/hide with correct content
Expected Result:
Helpful text appears
 hides on blur

Test Case Description: K-Map navigation shows one section at a time
Expected Result:
Only active section visible
 others hidden

Test Case Description: Offline page served when network is down
All informative images have meaningful alt

Expected Result: All interactive elements reachable and usable
Visible focus indicator on each element

Test Case Description: Appropriate ARIA roles/labels present where needed
Expected Result: ARIA used correctly (no misuse or noise)

Test Case Description: Modal announces and traps focus until closed
Expected Result:
Modal labeled
 ESC closes
 focus returns

Test Case Description:
Headings follow logical order
 landmarks defined

Expected Result: SR announces labels, states, and feedback
Only platformPreloader is preloaded (no unused preloads)

Expected assets cached
 no stale critical files

No errors
 only expected info logs

Test Case Description: Smoke test full flow in Chrome latest
Smoke test full flow in Firefox latest
Smoke test full flow in Safari latest (macOS/iOS)
Smoke test full flow in Edge latest

Site enforces HTTPS
 HSTS by host
Expected Result:
Redirects to HTTPS

Test Case Description: Meta security headers present (nosniff, XSS, referrer)
Service worker scope limited to site
Title, description, keywords present and accurate
Expected Result:
Meta present
 no duplicates
 accurate content

If configured, GA4 fires
 else N/A

Test Case Description: Custom 404 page rendered for unknown routes
Random sample of sections free of typos
User guidance and steps are clear
App icons load at all sizes

Expected Result:
Controls responsive
 no autoplay w/o user intent

UI remains responsive
 no console errors

Test Case Description: Direct URL anchors open correct section

Expected Result: No full referrers to third-party when restricted

Test Case Description: No secrets or tokens in source
Perceived loading feedback visible when needed
Automated crawl finds no broken links

Expected Result: All icons served with correct types
All features operable without horizontal scroll
Embedding blocked by policy or not used
New assets served after update cycle

Test Case Description: Correct lab scripts load on demand
Content Security Policy doesn’t block features
Expected Result: No CSP violations for required assets

Test Case Description: Asset references match on case-sensitive hosts
Total JS kept minimal for SPA
Scroll inertia/locking feels natural on mobile
If JS disabled, basic content visible
